meta.name: description
meta.content: Lincoln Charter is located in LINCOLN CO, NC.

li.a: Mental Health and Social Emotional Well Being

div.div: Facilitating a College Prep Experience Since 1998

The mission of Lincoln Charter School is to facilitate the development of college ready individuals through emphasis on rigorous academics and our community expectations: honesty, respect, empathy, responsibility, service and preparedness.
On January 17, Lincoln Charter celebrated a groundbreaking at the Lincolnton Campus for the upcoming Elementary Building and MS/HS Expansion!

section.class: content-container events1-container slick-container content-size-small orientation-horizontal date-orientation-horizontal

span.div:
Largest non-virtual charter school in NC
Founded in 1998

2018 NCHSAA Wachovia Cup - 1A State Champions
2018 NCHSAA Men's 1A Cross Country State Champions

Over 550 College Acceptances
$10.8+ million total dollars in merit scholarship offers
Graduation rate - >95%
